title: Error while using RequestParam annotation with required = false.

labels.name: area/spring
labels.description: Issues relating to the Spring integration

body:
### Describe the bug

Creating a rest controller with a method that uses the RequestParam annotation with required = false then the response status is not found without any exception.Â 
I did some debugging. Maybe there was an error while converting the spring defaultValue to a number.


### Expected behavior

Success response

### Actual behavior

Not Found

### How to Reproduce?

```
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/endpoint")
public class Controller {

    @GetMapping("/test")
    public ResponseEntity method(@RequestParam(value = "id", required = false) Long id) {
        return ResponseEntity.ok().build();
    }
}
```

Dependencies
```
<dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
            <artifactId>quarkus-spring-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
            <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
            <artifactId>quarkus-junit5</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>io.rest-assured</groupId>
            <artifactId>rest-assured</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
   </dependencies>
```

curl --location --request GET 'http://localhost:8080/greeting/test'

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Kernel Version 21.5.0

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.7" 2023-04-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Homebrew (build 17.0.7+0) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Homebrew (build 17.0.7+0, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.2.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.6 

### Additional information

_No response_
